name: Galactic Gladiators (itch)
description: Warriors from all over the galaxy came to these gladiatorial fights, including ... mushroom? a stone? it seems that the great wars are too busy for our battles of epic proportions. Well, you'll have to have fun as it turns out, buy gladiators( whoever they are) and send them into battle, then buy others and so reach the bosses that already represent at least something.
